venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description:
Join us as we check out the Emerging Trends Fashion Show at the Cylcorama. The event is part of Boston Fashion Week and show cases emerging designers.

Hosted by Miss Rachel Baker, former Miss New Hamshire and entertainment reporter, The 4th annual Emerging Trends Show will be held on September 24th, 2011. This event is a dedicated effort to aid the Boston fashion community in developing its reputation known for innovation and creativity. 

Seating is limited for the event with the General Admission ticket. Tickets will sell out, so please get them soon.

Get your tickets at:

http://et2011.eventbrite.com/event/1904800309
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet OUTSIDE, to the right of the entrance. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Boston Fashion Week Emerging Trends Fashion Show at Clyclorama
